item.title: hopegreenberg on "Ridiculous question: blogs"
item.dc:creator: hopegreenberg
item.description:
It feels like a ridiculous question to ask but here goes:

In the wake of Google Reader's demise I have been trying several other feed readers and it occurred to me that this might be a good time to review my current list of feeds with an eye to refreshing it (and introducing my students to the world of DH blogs). Time to get out of the old rut. Time to swing wide the floodgates and dive in to the whirlpool. Time to...stop with the cliched images...

So, what say you DH Answer readers: what are your go to digital humanities/history blogs? Your must reads, your odd but compelling favorites, your "what every young DH student should know" blogs (or even tweeters for that matter)?

- Hope (hope.greenberg@uvm.edu if you want to quietly nominate your own)
